person.persName: Winthrop Hartly Hopson (Fayette County, Kentucky, minister. )

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, minister. Christian County, Kentucky, native. Married to Rebecca Parsons Hopson in Gasconade County, Missouri, on April 30, 1844. Married to Caroline Gray Parsons Hopson in Callaway County, Missouri, on March 9, 1848. Father of Sarah Frances Hopson. Married to Ella Chapel Hopson in Dubuque, Dubuque County, Iowa, on September 30, 1850. Physician in Fayette, Howard County, Missouri, in 1848. Minister in Howard County, Missouri, in 1850. Minister in Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1860. Arrested for Confederate sympathies in July 1862. Imprisoned at Johnson's Island from 1862 to 1863.
